meanings.definition: The quality or state of being supernatural.
meanings.sent1: The supernaturalness of the ghost stories captivated the children.
meanings.sent2: Belief in supernaturalness has been a part of human culture for centuries.
meanings.sent3: The supernaturalness of the situation made everyone laugh nervously.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a supernaturalness that seemed to pierce through your soul.
meanings.sent5: The forest was shrouded in a thick supernaturalness that sent shivers down their spines.

meanings.sent1: The movie was filled with supernaturalness, from ghosts to witches.
meanings.sent2: Many people are fascinated by the supernaturalness of haunted houses.
meanings.sent3: The supernaturalness of the mystery novel kept her up all night reading.
meanings.sent4: The supernaturalness of the old castle gave it an eerie and mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The supernaturalness of the full moon transformed the night into a magical experience.
